title: Generator to Array
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of generators in JavaScript and how they can be used to simplify the process of iterating over large sets of data. Generators are a powerful tool that allows us to define an iterative algorithm by writing a single function that generates successive values. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of generators and how they can be used in your JavaScript code.

meta.title: Exploring JavaScript Generators: Streamlining Iterative Algorithms
meta.description: Learn how to use generators to simplify the process of iterating over large data sets in JavaScript.
meta.keywords: data processing, javascript, javascript practice, javascript tutor, javascript practice online, javascript lab, iterators, generators, programming tutorials

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
